name: UIRegion
desc: A shape for use in UIKit Dynamics.

items.name: class var infinite: UIRegion
items.desc: Returns the region that encloses all points.

items.name: init(size: CGSize)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a rectangular region of the specified size.

items.name: init(radius: CGFloat)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a region with a circular shape of the specified radius.

items.name: func inverse() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region that is the mathematical inverse of the current region.

items.name: func byDifference(from: UIRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region created by subtracting the specified region from the current region.

items.name: func byIntersection(with: UIRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region containing only the area occupied by both the specified region and current region.

items.name: func byUnion(with: UIRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region containing the combined areas of the specified region and the current region.

items.name: func contains(CGPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the specified point is inside of the current region.
